questions.question: What is the name of the first page you encounter after logging into your web page?
How can you get involved with WordPress?
What ways to use WordPress?
What case we cannot recommend WordPress to our client?
options: If client is working on non-CMS base project
If site wants complex or innovative e-commerce
In case of enterprise intranet solution

questions.question: Which relational database does WordPress use?
What are the rules that you have to follow for WordPress plugin development?
options: Create a sub-folder for PHP files, translations, and assets

questions.question: What are the steps you can take if your WordPress file is hacked?
options: Install security plugins like WP security
Re-install the latest version of WordPress
Change password and user-ids for all your users

questions.question: What is a WordPress taxonomy?
In WordPress, what is the user role with the highest privilege level?
What are rules to follow in WordPress plugin development?
options: Setup a prefix (related to your brand)

questions.question: CMS stands for ___.
Which type of data can be stored in WordPress as media?
Which of these is a feature of WordPress?
options: Provides tools for Search Engine Optimisation
Contains multiple themes to style our website

questions.question: Which of these is an advantage of WordPress?
options: SEO tools make on-site SEO easier
Frequent updates require multiple backup copies
questions.answer: SEO tools make on-site SEO easier

questions.question: Which of these is a free WordPress domain name provided to WordPress.com users?
Which database is required by WordPress?
Which of these fields is not required to be filled while first installing the WordPress?
The Quick draft section in WordPress is used for ___?
options: Creating mini-posts with titles and small details
questions.answer: Creating mini-posts with titles and small details

questions.question: Which of these is not seen on the WordPress dashboard?
What is the default post Category for WordPress?
options: The first category added on WordPress

questions.question: What is the difference between WordPress Posts and Pages?
options: There is no difference between Posts and Pages
Posts are entries listed in reverse chronological order on the site homepage and Pages are static and are not listed by date
Pages are entries listed in reverse chronological order on the site homepage and Posts are static and are not listed by date
questions.answer: Posts are entries listed in reverse chronological order on the site homepage and Pages are static and are not listed by date

questions.question: You can change your wp themes using?
What is name of configuration file in WordPress ?
What is a permalink?
options: The numeric IP address of your WordPress site
The complete URL of your WordPress site
Part of your WordPress URL which you set
questions.answer: Part of your WordPress URL which you set

questions.question: Which is highest privilege level in WordPress?
What are the steps you can take if your WordPress file is hacked?
options: Install security plugins like WP security
Re-install the latest version of WordPress
Change password and user-ids for all your users

questions.question: What task does search engine visibility performs in WordPress?
options: Discourage search engines from indexing the site
questions.answer: Discourage search engines from indexing the site
